name: NBA Live 99
overview: NBA Live is back on the PlayStation and this time it includes such features as multiple seasons and a practice mode. You can also hit the hardwood in either the faster paced Arcade mode or the more realistic Simulation mode. While all of the NBA teams and ballplayers are here, user options allow athletes to be drafted, signed, traded, created, and released. NBA Live 99 also includes play-by-play speech and motion-captured moves. Features: * Choose from a simulation or an arcade style of play * Create a custom athlete and manage rosters through trades or free agency * Includes play-by-play commentary, high-res stadium models, and motion-captured moves
